additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Tea Sachet - Creamer, sugar, maltodextrin, instant black tea, thickener, flavouring, sweetener. Pearls - Water, corn starch, thickeners, colour, sweetener, preservatives, flavouring.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Soy, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: The brown sugar pearls pose a choking hazard to children, therefore the product is not suitable for consumption by children under the age of 5. Adult supervision is required if consumed by children or the elderly.

description: With a unique blend of rich Sri Lankan black tea and milk, taste the creamy, delicious flavour of our Royal Milk tea! The cherry on top is our irresistibly chewy instant pearls!
name: Bubble Tea Royal Milk 65g
